html: It just happened again. Christ The King Middle School in Gretna, Louisiana expelled this beautiful young Black girl saying that her hair style was "unnatural." She was humiliated and removed from the school over it. Let's be clear - this is Christianity as White Supremacy.pic.twitter.com/22IIKD9UCk
text:
It just happened again. 

Christ The King Middle School in Gretna, Louisiana expelled this beautiful young Black girl saying that her hair style was "unnatural." 

She was humiliated and removed from the school over it. 

Let's be clear - this is Christianity as White Supremacy.pic.twitter.com/22IIKD9UCk

html: It’s been a tough couple of weeks for baseball on twitter. It sucks to see racist and homophobic language coming from inside our league - a league I’m so proud to be a part of that I’ve worked really hard to make a more accepting and inclusive place for all our fans to enjoy.
text: It’s been a tough couple of weeks for baseball on twitter. It sucks to see racist and homophobic language coming from inside our league - a league I’m so proud to be a part of that I’ve worked really hard to make a more accepting and inclusive place for all our fans to enjoy.

html: Trump keeps trying to blame Democrats, but here's John Kelly in March 2017 talking about implementing forced separation for immigrant families: "I am considering, in order to deter more movement along this terribly dangerous network, I am considering exactly that."pic.twitter.com/OrfVycn6Nx
text:
Trump keeps trying to blame Democrats, but here's John Kelly in March 2017 talking about implementing forced separation for immigrant families:

"I am considering, in order to deter more movement along this terribly dangerous network, I am considering exactly that."pic.twitter.com/OrfVycn6Nx
